title: 2BR Historic Living in the North Loop!  City Views, Close to River!
posting_body: ['We’re excited to announce 724 Lofts, a gorgeous historic rehab!', '724 Lofts is a historic building with brand new interiors, exposed brick, functional floor plans, and superior customer service located in the idyllic walkable, bike-able North Loop neighborhood.', 'Your backyard is the Mississippi River National Recreation Area, with miles of trails winding through parkland.', 'Your front yard is the North Loop playground with bars, restaurants, and boutique retail; all just a short walk to world class sports and entertainment venues like the Guthrie Theatre, Twins Stadium, Fillmore, and First Ave!', '#601 -- Plan A', 'Unit 601 is a two bedroom, one bath home located on the 6th floor.', 'It features chic, polished concrete floors, electric range, in-unit washer and dryer, spacious closets, white Carrera Cloud quartz countertops, and large historic windows for ample sunlight and downtown views!', 'Be among the first to call 724 Lofts home!', 'For info on amenities and to apply: <URL>', 'Prices & Specials subject to change.', '724 Lofts is managed by Solhem Companies: <URL>', 'Minneapolis -- Mpls -- North Loop -- Warehouse District -- NE -- Northeast -- U of M -- Boutique -- Luxury -- Scandinavian -- Mid-Century Modern -- Bike Friendly -- Pet, Dog, Cat Friendly -- Green Living -- Sustainable -- Electric Car Charging -- Historic Rehab']
